TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Определяет метод для добавления части XPS в пакет XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Дополнительные сведения о `DocumentStructure` элемент [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] пакета, см. в разделе 9 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] спецификации, который можно получить в [XPS: спецификация и формировании](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Дополнительные сведения о `DocumentStructure` элемент [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] пакет, в главе 9 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] спецификации, который можно получить в [XPS: спецификация и формировании](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](https://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
